Title: Death on the Vine
Writer: John Banas (additional story editor), Chris Corbett, Kristen Dunphy (additional story editor), Kerry Greenwood (novel), Emma J. Steele (story)
Actors: Essie Davis, Nathan Page, Hugo Johnstone-Burt, Ashleigh Cummings
Plot: When Phryne and Dot arrive at an idyllic vineyard they quickly become involved in investigating a suspicious death but hostile townsfolk do everything they can to drive them out of town. Meanwhile Hugh prepares for a daunting task.
